cast.overview: In a town in the Northwest of the province of Buenos Aires, a group of neighbors is organized to recover the economy of the area, but when the corralito is implemented in the country and they suffer a fraud, their hopes disappear. Now, they will unite to recover the lost money and give the blow of their lives to their greatest enemy.
cast.title: Heroic Losers

details.biography: Andrés Parra was born in Cali on September 18, 1977. With more than 20 years of experience in the field of acting, he has had the responsibility to prove himself as an actor in theater, film and television, leaving an impression on the public and critics with which he is gradually consolidating as one of the most versatile and enigmatic actors in the country and Latin America, something that has allowed him to be awarded with different prizes both nationally and internationally.
details.name: Andrés Parra
